summary: Feature request to add WorkflowInfo.historySizeInBytes property to the TypeScript SDK. This allows workflows to access the size of their execution history, which was blocked pending server support.
userImpact: Users can now monitor and optimize workflow memory usage by accessing history size information.
proposedFix: Add historySizeInBytes field to WorkflowInfo class once server support is available.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented after server support became available and related suggestion (isContinueAsNewSuggested) was also added.
